name: Pirate’s Plunder
description:
Description:

    Pirate’s plunder is a game where the goal is to plunder docks to get money and upgrade your ship while defeating enemy ships, and turrets. Then enter a whirlpool to end the level.

Controls:

     Mouse to move with shooting being automated out the sides. Click the shop icon for upgrades, and destroy chests for loot. Park next to docks to wait and plunder them, and get red fruit for health.
